GetAutoAssignableBotRoles(GuildConfig)

Retrieves the list of bot roles that are set to auto-assign for a given guild configuration.

Declaration
public static List<ulong> GetAutoAssignableBotRoles(this GuildConfig gc)
Parameters
Type Name Description
GuildConfig gc

The guild configuration to retrieve the auto-assign bot roles for.
Returns
Type Description
List<ulong>

A list of role IDs that are currently set to auto-assign bot roles in the guild configuration.
